name: Ryzer: The Reflectors Path
description:
In another normal day of his job as a space engineer, Ryzer is going to fix a space prison ship and things don't go his way.
In Ryzer: The Reflectors Path, help Ryzer find the best path through the reflectors in this futuristic puzzle and finally just complete his job.

Features:

  • Relaxing gameplay without lose;
  • Originally composed soundtrack to get you in the mood;
  • 4 Different reflectors;
  • 35 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity;
  • Unlock extremely precision with focus mode.
